ygData.subject: Re: Appearance question
ygData.msgSnippet: Huh.  I m a female half-elf, and the Shin Greaves look just like normal steel color to me.  I m currently quite clashing, with bronze breastplate, shin
ygData.messageBody:
Huh. I'm a female half-elf, and the Shin Greaves look just like normal steel color to me. I'm
currently quite clashing, with bronze breastplate, shin greaves, Lambent boots and vambraces,
snake skin gloves (of all things!), hero bracer (which is GREEN), bracer of erollsi, and
blackened iron crown (looks like banded helm).

Looking forward to being mostly blue (except for the green hero bracer).

Laluni Songhammer, level 29 bard of E'Ci

scott brisko wrote:

> From: scott@... (scott brisko)
>
> Rose tinted Steel here as well.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Thursday, November 11, 1999 10:23 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] Appearance question
>
> > From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> >
> > An appearance question for all you steel plate wearing wood-elf males out
> > there. What color is your steel plate tinged with? I am wearing the shin
> > greaves, which I thought would look just like plate, but I have never seen
> > anyone else with legs that are this color. They appear to be a rose
> tinged
> > silvery hue on me and ever since I put them on I constantly get "XXXXXX is
> > examining your equipment" or whatever that message is. The wood elf
> females
> > I have seen in what looked like steel plate were blue tinged. Is this the
> > normal appearance of steel plate on wood elves? If the rose color is
> normal
> > then I guess I have never seen any wood elves in steel plate on E'ci.
> >
> > Kitasi
> >
> > > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with the subject lol.
> >
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with the subject lol.
